results.description: @sab_3d's custom-designed Bluetooth speaker, resembling a cassette tape, offers wireless streaming, rechargeable battery, and high-quality sound, making it a nostalgic conversation starter.

results.productName: Retro Style Headphones with SD Card and Bluetooth
results.description: These retro-style headphones feature Bluetooth, an SD card slot, cushioned ear cups, leather headband, and metal accents, blending classic design with modern functionality.
This vintage-style Bluetooth speaker features a 1950s radio design, digital display, Apple Music and Spotify support, and retro dials, adding a touch of nostalgia to any room.
This portable record player, with a retro design and built-in speaker, offers a convenient way to enjoy your vinyl collection on the go.

results.productName: Classic Jukebox with Karaoke and Streaming
results.description: This retro jukebox features modern features like karaoke, AM/FM radio, Bluetooth, and Spotify & Apple Music support, with vibrant LED lights and a classic design for home entertainment.
The Retro Game Boy Gaming Console offers a nostalgic gaming experience with its modern design, color LCD screen, rechargeable battery, and pre-loaded 300 classic games.
